Package org.apache.jena.sparql.service.enhancer.impl

Class RequestScheduler<G,I>

java.lang.Object
org.apache.jena.sparql.service.enhancer.impl.RequestScheduler<G,I>
Type Parameters:
G - group key type (e.g. service IRI)
I - item type (e.g. Binding)
public class RequestScheduler<G,I> extends Object
Accumulates items from an input iterator into batches. Every returned batch will start with the first item index not covered by any prior batch. Parameters are:
  • maxBulkSize: The maximum number of items allowed in a batch returned by a call to next()
  • maxeReadAhead: The maximum number of items allowed to read from the input iterator in order to fill a batch
  • maxInputDistance: The index of items w.r.t. to the input iterator in a batch must not be farther apart than this distance
A batch is guaranteed to have at least one item. If any of the thresholds is exceeded a batch will have fewer items that its maximum allowed size.
